name: SIDUS
introduce: SIDUS HEROES is an AAA-level, MMORPG game. The game is set in a space metaverse at a time when technological advancements have reached the level of merging with all living beings. SIDUS HEROES provides users with multiple gaming scenarios: interstellar exploration, battles and settlements, as well as scope for political, social and economic development. The game relies on a closed economic system that’s based on a limited emission of resources. It incorporates the ‘play-to-earn’ model into all its in-game items and has a two-token based system.
